notes: The Spell Block has a higher priority than Linken's Sphere, and lower priority than Counterspell.

The Spell Reflection has a lower priority than Lotus Orb and Counterspell. If these two are active on the owner, Echo Shield does not trigger at all, including its spell block. This means when affected by of Lotus Orb, Linken's Sphere triggers instead.
Multiple instances of Mirror Shield do not stack. When having multiple, only one triggers, but all go on cooldown.
abilities.description: Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster every once every 4 seconds.
